content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]ATX Technology excels in providing Project Management, Engineering, Inspection, Maintenance specialized service that provides its clients end-to-end project management services encompassing the entire life cycle of telecom infrastructure implementation – starting from site survey to site integration.

We regularly provide cost estimation services and curtail them to our Customers specific needs while utilizing our real world construction experience. This allows you more accurate budget provisioning and planning.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]Our staff regularly locates and records the as-built documentation of facilities and can provide you these services on a single need basis or can supply you with a long term contract, all of which will provide the proper coordination between the Local One Call Agencies and original requesting parties[/vc_column_text]

Cost Estimation and Feasibility Studies
Engineering – Survey & CAD
Permitting – Building, ROW, DOT, RR and Municipalities
Telecom Infrastructure Construction
Inspection – Quality Control & Guaranteed Installation
Material Management – Turnkey Purchasing & Logistics
As-Built Documentation – Final Records with depths and offsets
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image=”3611″ img_size=”919*572″ css=”.vc_custom_1599207637990{margin-top: 20px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
